short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds Billboard chart info for the currently playing song

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Press the button when you're playing a song from Soundcloud or Youtube and Chrome will open up a new tab with the Billboard chart page for that artist.

Coming to the next version:
A pop-up with song-specific information
Support for iHeartRadio
